comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Hard Working Norwegians.  They are known for being good, hard workers .   It is in their heritance.      Even the Women  work hard.    Alt pa Norge !!!

comment.author: 46987209@N08
comment._content: When I was in Bosnia I saw wagon loads of Seniors coming in from a hard days work in the fields.  Senior men cut grass on the side of the road with sickles.  It seemed unusual to me, to se all the seniors working so hard in the senior years.
